text:
Bundesliga
Bayern Munich: Miroslav Klose, new assistant coach!
While he was U17 manager, Miroslav Klose will become the assistant coach of the club's interim coach, Hans-Dieter Flick.
06 Nov 2019, 15:41 by Hugo Deloraine



FC Bayern MunichBayern is on the decline and would like to reverse this trend, despite the departures of Arjen Robben and Franck Ribery.Icon Sport



Manuel NeuerIcon Sport



Joshua KimmichIcon Sport



Niklas S√ºleIcon Sport



Lucas HernandezIcon Sport



David AlabaIcon Sport



Javi MartinezIcon Sport



ThiagoIcon Sport



Thomas M√ºllerIcon Sport



Serge GnabryIcon Sport



Kingsley ComanIcon Sport



Robert LewandowskiIcon Sport

Bayern Munich: the possible eleven of the season




While discussions on which coach will succeed Niko Kovac on Bayern's bench, it is Hans-Dieter Flick who plays the interim role, including to face Olympiakos on Wednesday in the Champions League and Borussia Dortmund this Saturday at 18:30 in the Bundesliga. To replace him, he has with him Hermann Gerland and asked Miroslav Klose to accompany him.




Deputy, but for how long?




Miroslav Klose + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The 2014 world champion would be the second assistant interim coach while he was U17 manager for Bayern. He reportedly made an agreement with Hans-Dieter Flick on Wednesday afternoon. It remains to be seen what his role in Bayern will be when the new coach arrives.
